content.query:
let day_names =dynamic(["Sunday","Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday"]);
let averageData = view() {  CommonSecurityLog 
| extend p1Array = split(AdditionalExtensions,";")
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Array
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Array)
| extend Name=tostring(split(p1Array,"=")[0]),Value=substring(p1Array,indexof(p1Array,"=")+1)
| evaluate pivot(Name, any(Value), TimeGenerated, TenantId, DeviceVendor, DeviceProduct, DeviceVersion, DeviceEventClassID, Activity, LogSeverity, OriginalLogSeverity, DeviceAction)
| where TimeGenerated > datetime(2000-01-01)
| where isnotnull(OriginatingUsers) and OriginatingUsers != ""
| summarize Count=count() by Year=getyear(TimeGenerated), Month=monthofyear(TimeGenerated), Day=dayofmonth(TimeGenerated)
| summarize Average_Count=toint(avg(Count)) by Day=dayofweek(make_datetime(Year,Month,Day)), SortData="Average Daily Change"
| order by Day asc};
let weeklyData = view() {  CommonSecurityLog 
| extend p1Array = split(AdditionalExtensions,";")
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Array
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Array)
| extend Name=tostring(split(p1Array,"=")[0]),Value=substring(p1Array,indexof(p1Array,"=")+1)
| evaluate pivot(Name, any(Value), TimeGenerated, TenantId, DeviceVendor, DeviceProduct, DeviceVersion, DeviceEventClassID, Activity, LogSeverity, OriginalLogSeverity, DeviceAction)
| where TimeGenerated > startofweek(now())
| where isnotnull(OriginatingUsers) and OriginatingUsers != ""
| summarize Count=count() by Year=getyear(TimeGenerated), Month=monthofyear(TimeGenerated), Day=dayofmonth(TimeGenerated)
| summarize Average_Count=toint(avg(Count)) by Day=dayofweek(make_datetime(Year,Month,Day)), SortData="Daily Change"
| order by Day asc };
union withsource=TableName averageData,weeklyData
| order by Day asc, SortData asc
| project Average_Count,Day,TableName,SortData,Days=tostring(day_names[indexof('00010203040506', format_timespan(Day,'dd'))/2])
| render barchart with (kind=unstacked)
content.title: Weekly Active Directory Change Count

content.query:
Event
| where Source == 'Semperis-Operation-Log' and EventID == 20000
| sort by TimeGenerated desc 
| parse RenderedDescription with "Operation: " Operation "Access Granted:" AccessGranted "Result: " Result "Details: " * "Trustee Name: " TrusteeName " Correlation ID: " * " Source: " HostIP "WebSite Target" *
| extend host = tostring(HostIP)
| extend HostIP = trim_end(":",HostIP)
| project TimeGenerated, UserName, HostIP
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| top 10 by TimeGenerated
content.title: Successful Logons

content.query:
Event
| where Source == 'Semperis-Operation-Log' and ( EventID == 20000 or EventID == 20002 )
| sort by TimeGenerated desc 
| parse RenderedDescription with "Operation: " Operation "Access Granted:" AccessGranted "Result: " Result "Details: " * "Trustee Name: " TrusteeName " Correlation ID: " * " Source: " HostIP "WebSite Target" *
| extend host = tostring(HostIP)
| extend HostIP = trim_end(":",HostIP)
| where isnotempty(AccessGranted)
| summarize Count=count() by AccessGranted
content.title: DSP Logins

content.query:
Event
| where Source == 'Semperis-DSP-Notifications' 
| extend p1Xml = parse_xml(EventData).DataItem.EventData.Data
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Xml
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Xml)
| extend Key1=tostring(['@Name']), Value=['#text']
| evaluate pivot(Key1, any(Value), TimeGenerated, Source, EventLog, Computer, EventLevel, EventLevelName, EventID, EventCategory, UserName, Type, _ResourceId)
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project ruleName, fullOperation
content.title: Notifications

content.query:
Event
| where Source == 'Semperis-Operation-Log' and EventID == 20012
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| extend p1Xml = parse_xml(EventData).DataItem.EventData.Data
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Xml
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Xml)
| extend Name=tostring(['@Name']), Value=['#text']
| evaluate pivot(Name, any(Value), TimeGenerated, Source, EventLog, Computer, EventLevel, EventLevelName, EventID, EventCategory, UserName, Type, _ResourceId)
| parse details with "Occured at (UTC): " OccurredAt "Session ID: " SessionID "Trustee Name: " TrusteeName "Correlation ID: " CorrelationID "Source: " Source "WebSite Target: " WebSiteTarget "Product: " Product "Component: " Component "AD Information: " ADInformation "Object GUID: " ObjectGUID "Attribute: " Attribute "Distinguished Name: " DistinguishedName "Additional Information: "AdditionalInformation "Operation Detail: " OperationDetail "operationName: " operationName "trustee: " trustee "personas: " personas "Status: " status "Granted: " Granted "Result: " Result
| extend _AccessGranted = iif(operationName contains "CreateRbacIdentity", "Added", "Removed")
| extend _Identity = iif(operationName contains "CreateRbacIdentity", trustee, tostring(substring(trustee,1,strlen(trustee))))
| extend _Identity = iif(operationName contains "CreateRbacIdentity", _Identity, replace_string(_Identity,"'",""))
| extend add_personas = replace_string(replace_string(replace_string(personas,"{ Name = ","")," }",""),";",",")
| extend remove_personas = replace_string(personas,";",",")
| extend grid_personas = iif(operationName contains "CreateRbacIdentity", add_personas, remove_personas)
| extend date_to_sort = format_datetime(TimeGenerated,"yyyy-mm-dd   HH:mm:ss")
| order by date_to_sort desc
| project TrusteeName, _Identity, _AccessGranted, grid_personas, TimeGenerated
content.title: Role Based Access Control Changes

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| extend p1Array = split(AdditionalExtensions,";")
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Array
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Array)
| extend Name=tostring(split(p1Array,"=")[0]),Value=substring(p1Array,indexof(p1Array,"=")+1)
| evaluate pivot(Name, any(Value), TimeGenerated, TenantId, DeviceVendor, DeviceProduct, DeviceVersion, DeviceEventClassID, Activity)
| where isnotnull(OriginatingUsers) and OriginatingUsers != ""
| summarize ChangedCount = count() by tostring(OriginatingUsers)
| project replace_string(OriginatingUsers,'\\\\','/'), ChangedCount, OriginatingUsers, "Details"
| order by ChangedCount desc
| top 5 by ChangedCount
content.title: Top 5 Identities Making Changes

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| extend p1Array = split(AdditionalExtensions,";")
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Array
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Array)
| extend Name=tostring(split(p1Array,"=")[0]),Value=substring(p1Array,indexof(p1Array,"=")+1)
| evaluate pivot(Name, any(Value), TimeGenerated, TenantId, DeviceVendor, DeviceProduct, DeviceVersion, DeviceEventClassID, Activity, LogSeverity, OriginalLogSeverity, DeviceAction)
| parse DistinguishedName with * "CN\\=" cnName "," *
| parse DistinguishedName with * "DC\\=" dcName "," *
| where ClassName != "dnsNode"
| summarize ChangedCount=count() by cnName
| project cnName, ChangedCount, "Details"
| order by ChangedCount desc
| top 5 by ChangedCount
content.title: Top 5 Objects Changed

content.query:
Event
| where Source == 'Semperis-DSP-Notifications' 
| extend p1Xml = parse_xml(EventData).DataItem.EventData.Data
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Xml
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Xml)
| extend Name=tostring(['@Name']), Value=['#text']
| evaluate pivot(Name, any(Value), TimeGenerated, Source, EventLog, Computer, EventLevel, EventLevelName, EventID, EventCategory, UserName, Type, _ResourceId)
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(fullOperation)
content.title: AD Change Types

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| extend p1Array = split(AdditionalExtensions,";")
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Array
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Array)
| extend Name=tostring(split(p1Array,"=")[0]),Value=substring(p1Array,indexof(p1Array,"=")+1)
| evaluate pivot(Name, any(Value), TimeGenerated, TenantId, DeviceVendor, DeviceProduct, DeviceVersion, DeviceEventClassID, Activity, LogSeverity, OriginalLogSeverity, DeviceAction)
| parse DistinguishedName with * "CN\\=" cnName "," *
| parse DistinguishedName with * "DC\\=" dcName "," *
| where ClassName == 'group'
| project AttributeModificationType,cnName,OriginatingTime,replace_string(OriginatingUsers,"\\\\","\\"),StringValueFrom,StringValueTo
content.title: Builtin Group Changes

content.query:
Event
| where Source == 'Semperis-DSP-Security' 
| extend p1Xml = parse_xml(EventData).DataItem.EventData.Data
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Xml
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Xml)
| extend Name=tostring(['@Name']), Value=['#text']
| evaluate pivot(Name, any(Value), TimeGenerated, Source, EventLog, Computer, EventLevel, EventLevelName, EventID, EventCategory, UserName, Type, _ResourceId)
| extend isProblem = iif(result == "Failed", true, false)
| where isnotnull(numberOfResults) and isProblem == true
| order by tostring(securityIndicatorName)
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(securityIndicatorName)
| top 5 by Count
content.title: Top 5 Failed Security Indicators

| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Xml
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Xml)
| extend Name=tostring(['@Name']), Value=['#text']
| evaluate pivot(Name, any(Value), TimeGenerated, Source, EventLog, Computer, EventLevel, EventLevelName, EventID, EventCategory, UserName, Type, _ResourceId)
| extend isProblem = iif(result == "Failed", true, false)
| where isnotnull(numberOfResults) and isProblem == true
| order by tostring(securityIndicatorName)
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(securityIndicatorName)
| top 5 by Count
content.title: Top 5 Failed Security Indicators

content.query:
Event
| where Source == 'Semperis-DSP-Security' 
| extend p1Xml = parse_xml(EventData).DataItem.EventData.Data
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array p1Xml
| evaluate bag_unpack(p1Xml)
| extend Name=tostring(['@Name']), Value=['#text']
| evaluate pivot(Name, any(Value), TimeGenerated, Source, EventLog, Computer, EventLevel, EventLevelName, EventID, EventCategory, UserName, Type, _ResourceId)
| extend isProblem = iif(result == "Failed", true, false)
| where isnotnull(numberOfResults) and isProblem == true
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(securityFrameworkTags)
content.title: Amount of Generated Events per Category
